languages.text: Вы чувствуете, как в вашем глазу что-то ползает, и почти ничего им не видите. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами
You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means
languages.original_text: Вы чувствуете, как в вашем глазу что-то ползает, и почти ничего им не видите. От этой травмы нельзя избавиться обычными способами

traits.locale_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it.

You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

languages.text: 目の中を何かが這っているのを感じる。視力の大部分を失ってしまった。 通常の方法では除去できない
languages.original_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 目の中を何かが這っているのを感じる。視力の大部分を失ってしまった。 通常の方法では除去できない

languages.text: 你感觉到有什么东西在你里眼睛里爬，你几乎目不视物。 此效果无法通过通常手段移除
languages.original_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: 你感觉到有什么东西在你里眼睛里爬，你几乎目不视物。

languages.text: Sientes que algo se arrastra dentro de tu ojo, por el cual apenas puedes ver. No se puede curar por medios normales
languages.original_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Sientes que algo se arrastra dentro de tu ojo, por el cual apenas puedes ver.

languages.text: Du spürst etwas in deinem Auge herumkriechen. Du siehst deswegen schon fast nichts mehr. Kann mit normalen Mitteln nicht entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Du spürst etwas in deinem Auge herumkriechen. Du siehst deswegen schon fast nichts mehr.

languages.text: Vous sentez quelque chose ramper dans votre œil. D'ailleurs, vous n'y voyez plus très clair. Impossible à supprimer par des méthodes ordinaires.
languages.original_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Vous sentez quelque chose ramper dans votre œil. D'ailleurs, vous n'y voyez plus très clair.

languages.text: Gözünde kıpırdayan bir şey olduğunu hissediyorsun. Görme yetinin çoğunu yitirmiş vaziyettesin.
languages.original_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Cannot be removed by regular means

traits.locale_text: Gözünde kıpırdayan bir şey olduğunu hissediyorsun. Görme yetinin çoğunu kaybediyorsun.

languages.text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Can't be removed by normal means.

traits.locale_text: You can feel something crawling inside your eye. You have lost most of the vision in it. Can't be removed by normal means.
